name: Send an email and a text message via Go4clients for new Google Forms responses
description:
Every time a new Google Forms responses 
 is created, Make will automatically send an email and a text messasge in Go4clients. The template uses [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y0wCp8jhPwAxxwEsD8KF6Tzxy6s7-mQdIQ5VoXrQl40/edit?usp=sharing) example spreadsheet.
